AndoainMod:IrisBlue.NAME: Violet
AndoainMod:IrisBlue.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Summon [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust .
AndoainMod:IrisBlue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Summon [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust .

AndoainMod:Lemuen.NAME: Lemuen's Gaze
AndoainMod:Lemuen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy, ignoring Block, then apply 1 Vulnerable. Retain.

AndoainMod:Lemuen_E.NAME: Lemuen's Gaze
AndoainMod:Lemuen_E.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, ignoring Block, then apply 1 Vulnerable.

AndoainMod:Obsessed.NAME: Underground Sight
AndoainMod:Obsessed.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [E], 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, 1 Gold, shuffle 1 Dazed and 1 Wound into draw pile.
AndoainMod:Obsessed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [E], 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, 1 Gold, shuffle 1 Dazed and 1 Wound into *discard pile.

AndoainMod:RequiemChurch.NAME: Requiem Church
AndoainMod:RequiemChurch.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, for every 1 andoainmod:ammunition, gain !M! Block.
AndoainMod:RequiemChurch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, for every 1 andoainmod:ammunition, gain !M! Block.

AndoainMod:Eulogy.NAME: Eulogy
AndoainMod:Eulogy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable to enemies.   andoainmod:ricochet . NL Draw 1 card.
AndoainMod:Eulogy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable to enemies.   andoainmod:ricochet . NL Draw 2 cards.

AndoainMod:WayOfSuffering.NAME: Way of Suffering
AndoainMod:WayOfSuffering.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . When drawn, add a copy of this card to hand. NL Draw 2 cards.
AndoainMod:WayOfSuffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . When drawn, add a copy of this card to hand. NL Draw 2 cards.

AndoainMod:AmmoDepot.NAME: Extra-Legal Ammunition Depot
AndoainMod:AmmoDepot.DESCRIPTION: Gain ammunition equal to your andoainmod:ammunition limit. For each point of overflow, gain 3 Block and draw 1 card. Exhaust .
AndoainMod:AmmoDepot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain ammunition equal to your andoainmod:ammunition limit. For each point of overflow, gain 3 Block and draw 1 card.

AndoainMod:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
AndoainMod:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status cards and curses in hand, gain !B! Block. NL Randomly gain !M! of: 1 Energy / 1  andoainmod:ammunition  / draw 1 card.
AndoainMod:Prayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status cards and curses in hand, gain !B! Block. NL Randomly gain !M! of: 1 Energy / 1  andoainmod:ammunition  / draw 1 card.

AndoainMod:Reload.NAME: Reload
AndoainMod:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1  andoainmod:ammunition  , then draw cards equal to current ammunition. Exhaust .
AndoainMod:Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2  andoainmod:ammunition  , then draw cards equal to current ammunition. Exhaust .

AndoainMod:RecursiveSolution.NAME: Recursive Solution
AndoainMod:RecursiveSolution.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to remaining  andoainmod:ammunition  4 times, refill ammunition. This card's multiplier decreases by 1 and shuffles back into draw pile.
AndoainMod:RecursiveSolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to remaining  andoainmod:ammunition  6 times, refill ammunition. This card's multiplier decreases by 1 and shuffles back into draw pile.

AndoainMod:TrialAndError.NAME: Trial and Error
AndoainMod:TrialAndError.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to remaining  andoainmod:ammunition  1 times, ammo limit -1, this card's multiplier increases by 1 and shuffles back into draw pile.
AndoainMod:TrialAndError.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to remaining  andoainmod:ammunition  1 times, ammo limit -1, this card's multiplier increases by 1 and shuffles back into draw pile.

AndoainMod:Cherish.NAME: Still Cherished
AndoainMod:Cherish.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, remove Block from a random enemy and apply 1 stack of andoainmod:slow , shuffle 1 Burn into discard pile.
AndoainMod:Cherish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, remove Block from *all enemies, apply 1 stack of andoainmod:slow to *all enemies, shuffle 1 upgraded Burn into discard pile.

AndoainMod:FindPath.NAME: Pathfinding
AndoainMod:FindPath.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Choose one of the following andoainmod:path . NL *Myth NL *Obsession NL *Crossing
AndoainMod:FindPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . Exhaust . NL Choose one of the following *Path . NL *Myth NL *Obsession NL *Crossing

AndoainMod:Myth.NAME: Myth
AndoainMod:Myth.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak , shuffle 1 Dazed into hand, then apply 1 stack of andoainmod:stunned to all enemies. Gain 2 stacks of andoainmod:dream .
AndoainMod:Myth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak , shuffle 1 Dazed into hand, then apply 1 stack of andoainmod:stunned to all enemies. Gain 2 stacks of andoainmod:dream .

AndoainMod:Obsession.NAME: Obsession
AndoainMod:Obsession.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength , 1 Artifact , heal 5 health, at the end of each turn choose to Retain 1 card in hand
AndoainMod:Obsession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength , 1 Artifact , heal 5 health, at the end of each turn choose to Retain 1 card in hand

AndoainMod:Crossing.NAME: Crossing
AndoainMod:Crossing.DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded *Pathfinding + to hand, then shuffle an andoainmod:pathfinding into draw pile. Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Cannot play andoainmod:pathfinding this turn .
AndoainMod:Crossing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded *Pathfinding + to hand, then shuffle an *Pathfinding into draw pile. Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Cannot play andoainmod:pathfinding this turn .

AndoainMod:Iris.NAME: Iris
AndoainMod:Iris.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, summon [#FF0000]Enemy[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL If ice cream machine exists, draw 3 cards.
AndoainMod:Iris.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . NL Gain !B! Block, summon [#FF0000]Enemy[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL If ice cream machine exists, draw 3 cards.

AndoainMod:ShadowAndAsh.NAME: Shadow and Ash
AndoainMod:ShadowAndAsh.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . Can only be played while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state. Set ammunition and its limit to 0. NL Start of turn: Exhaust all *Status cards and *Curses in hand, draw pile, and discard pile, gaining 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, heal 1 HP per card (max 10).
AndoainMod:ShadowAndAsh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain . Can only be played while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state. Set ammunition and its limit to 0. NL Start of turn: Exhaust all *Status cards and *Curses in hand, draw pile, and discard pile, gaining 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, heal 1 HP per card (max 10).
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Light Unto Sufferers state.

AndoainMod:SeeWealthIntent.NAME: Greed Seen, Intent Born
AndoainMod:SeeWealthIntent.DESCRIPTION: You gain 30 additional gold when you win this combat (does not stack).
AndoainMod:SeeWealthIntent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You gain 30 additional gold when you win this combat (does not stack).

AndoainMod:Hyacinth.NAME: Hyacinth
AndoainMod:Hyacinth.DESCRIPTION: Summon [#FF0000]Enemy[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL Deal andoainmod:stunned 2 turns.
AndoainMod:Hyacinth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon [#FF0000]Enemy[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine . NL Deal andoainmod:stunned 2 turns.

AndoainMod:BackupGun.NAME: Backup Gun
AndoainMod:BackupGun.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ammunition, then deal !D! damage. andoainmod:ricochet .
AndoainMod:BackupGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ammunition, then deal !D! damage. andoainmod:ricochet .

AndoainMod:Overflowing.NAME: Overflowing
AndoainMod:Overflowing.DESCRIPTION: Consume all ammunition. For each bullet, deal !D! damage to random enemy target with andoainmod:ricochet . You cannot gain ammunition for !M! turns. NL andoainmod:deviation .
AndoainMod:Overflowing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume all ammunition modulo for each bullet, deal !D! damage to random enemy target with andoainmod:ricochet . You cannot gain ammunition for !M! turns. NL andoainmod:deviation .

AndoainMod:Dazzle.NAME: Dazzle
AndoainMod:Dazzle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage, gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , apply 1 Weak . andoainmod:ricochet .
AndoainMod:Dazzle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage, gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , apply 1 Weak . andoainmod:ricochet .

AndoainMod:TheLaw.NAME: Sacred Hierarchy

AndoainMod:TheLaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, target loses !M! Strength, gain !B! Block. andoainmod:ricochet .

AndoainMod:Mostima.NAME: Mostima's Support

AndoainMod:Mostima.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Innate . NL Apply andoainmod:stunned 1 turn to all enemies, apply !M! stacks of andoainmod:slow to all enemies.

AndoainMod:Mostima_E.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Ethereal . NL Apply andoainmod:stunned 1 turn to all enemies, apply !M! stacks of andoainmod:slow to all enemies.

AndoainMod:Fiammetta.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage to all units except yourself. NL Add a *You Must Repay to hand.
AndoainMod:Fiammetta.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Deal !D! damage to all units except yourself. NL Add a *You Must Repay to hand.

AndoainMod:Fiammetta_E.NAME: Fiammetta's Vengeance
AndoainMod:Fiammetta_E.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Ethereal . NL Deal !D! damage to all units except yourself. NL Add a *You Must Repay to hand.
AndoainMod:Fiammetta_E.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Ethereal . NL Deal !D! damage to all units except yourself. NL Add a *You Must Repay to hand.

AndoainMod:MyLateran.NAME: Laterano
AndoainMod:MyLateran.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , triple all enemies' Vulnerable and andoainmod:slow stacks. NL If you have Status cards in hand, Exhaust them and gain [E] .

AndoainMod:OnceLivedForever.NAME: Once Lived Forever
AndoainMod:OnceLivedForever.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Every turn, randomly gain a card costing 0 with Ethereal and Exhaust of andoainmod:squad-card . NL Drawn cards won't be repeated within 3 turns.
AndoainMod:OnceLivedForever.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Every turn, [#66CCFF]Choose[] to gain a card costing 0 with Ethereal and Exhaust of andoainmod:squad-card . NL Chosen cards cannot be repeated within 3 turns.

AndoainMod:YouMustRepay.NAME: You Must Repay
AndoainMod:YouMustRepay.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, lose 4 HP.
AndoainMod:YouMustRepay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, lose 4 HP.

AndoainMod:Echo.NAME: Sympathy of Life and Death Entrusted
AndoainMod:Echo.DESCRIPTION: When you or andoainmod:ice-cream-machine gain Block, heal HP, or take attack damage from non-ability sources, apply the same effect to the other.
AndoainMod:Echo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you or andoainmod:ice-cream-machine gain Block, heal HP, or take attack damage from non-ability sources, apply the same effect to the other.

AndoainMod:CandyTime.NAME: Sugar-Free Cooling

AndoainMod:CandyTime_E.NAME: Sugar-Free Cooling
AndoainMod:CandyTime_E.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Immediately change andoainmod:ice-cream-machine faction.
AndoainMod:CandyTime_E.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Immediately change andoainmod:ice-cream-machine faction. Beforehand, gain 1 Artifact .

AndoainMod:AutoRefrigeration.NAME: Fully Automated Cooling
AndoainMod:AutoRefrigeration.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . NL When [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine is destroyed, no longer apply debuffs to player. NL Every turn, gain a card costing 0 with *Exhaust *Sugar-Free Cooling .
AndoainMod:AutoRefrigeration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL When [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine is destroyed, no longer apply debuffs to player. NL Every turn, gain a card costing 0 with *Exhaust *Sugar-Free Cooling .

AndoainMod:Worship.NAME: Worship
AndoainMod:Worship.DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal damage equal to andoainmod:weekly-order 4 times, gain Block equal to Weekly Order 4 times. On Wednesday, Saturday, Sunday gain 1 andoainmod:ammunition / [E] / 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . When this card is Retained or Exhausted, advance Weekly Order by one day.

AndoainMod:BattlefieldFlank.NAME: Battlefield Flank
AndoainMod:BattlefieldFlank.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable first, then deal !D! damage. andoainmod:ricochet . NL You gain 1 Vulnerable.
AndoainMod:BattlefieldFlank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable first, then deal !D! damage. andoainmod:ricochet . NL You gain 1 Vulnerable.

AndoainMod:BigBabyBottle.NAME: Big Baby Bottle

AndoainMod:BigBabyBottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . andoainmod:dream 4. NL Deal !D! damage, if target is not Boss, apply andoainmod:stunned 1 turn.

AndoainMod:TheTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain 3 stacks of andoainmod:dream . Apply *2 Weak to Elite and Boss enemies. andoainmod:ricochet .

AndoainMod:UnInvited.NAME: Uninvited

AndoainMod:SeekingTruth.NAME: Seeking Truth
AndoainMod:SeekingTruth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times, andoainmod:ricochet , costs only 1 ammunition. NL Each time used in combat, all Seeking Truth deals -1 damage.
AndoainMod:SeekingTruth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times, andoainmod:ricochet , costs only 1 ammunition. NL Each time used in combat, all Seeking Truth deals -1 damage.

AndoainMod:Protection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine gains !M! stacks of Intangible .
AndoainMod:Protection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine gains !M! stacks of Intangible .

AndoainMod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
AndoainMod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: For each unit with attack intent, gain !B! Block. NL If any unit doesn't have attack intent, gain [E] and !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers .

AndoainMod:MonasticIcon.NAME: Amazing Grace
AndoainMod:MonasticIcon.DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:dream 3. Deal !D! damage, randomly swap costs of all Attack cards in hand. andoainmod:ricochet .

AndoainMod:OriginiumShield.NAME: Originium Shield
AndoainMod:OriginiumShield.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers and !B! Block.
AndoainMod:OriginiumShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers and !B! Block.

AndoainMod:CactusTart.NAME: Cactus Tart

AndoainMod:CactusTart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn start: if andoainmod:ice-cream-machine faction is [#FF0000]Enemy[] , gain 2 Thorns .

AndoainMod:TidalMemory.NAME: Tidal Echo
AndoainMod:TidalMemory.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain 3 stacks of andoainmod:dream . NL Gain 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity . NL Shuffle 4 Dazed into discard pile. NL End your turn.
AndoainMod:TidalMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain 3 stacks of andoainmod:dream . NL Gain 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity . NL Shuffle 4 Dazed into discard pile. NL End your turn.

AndoainMod:Communion.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:dream . NL Apply 99 Weak and gain 99 Weak yourself.
AndoainMod:Communion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Gain !M! stacks of andoainmod:dream . NL Apply 99 Weak and gain *1 Weak yourself.

AndoainMod:DessertTime.NAME: Dessert Time

AndoainMod:Funeral.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If no andoainmod:execute , shuffle 1 Dazed into discard pile.

AndoainMod:Liberation.DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:limit-use #b3 . NL Infinite Upgrade . Deal !D! damage, enters draw pile after played. NL When andoainmod:execute enemy, upgrade this card.

AndoainMod:DivineDesire.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 andoainmod:ammunition , deal !D! damage. NL If destroy andoainmod:ice-cream-machine , gain [E] [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.

AndoainMod:SummitOfNations.DESCRIPTION: Turn start: randomly gain a Common or Uncommon card from another color, costs 0 this turn.
AndoainMod:SummitOfNations.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn start: randomly gain an *Uncommon or *Rare card from another color, costs 0 this turn.

AndoainMod:Dream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Immediately enter andoainmod:dream . All enemies gain 1 Weak .

AndoainMod:Sleep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain , gain 7 Block, 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Retain all hand cards, end your turn.

AndoainMod:ThriftyHabits.NAME: Thrifty Habits
AndoainMod:ThriftyHabits.DESCRIPTION: When andoainmod:ammunition decreases, 50% chance to restore 1 ammunition. NL When ricochet fails to trigger, definitely restore consumed ammunition.
AndoainMod:ThriftyHabits.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When andoainmod:ammunition decreases, 50% chance to restore 1 ammunition. NL When ricochet fails to trigger, definitely restore consumed ammunition.

AndoainMod:FallenHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Turn start: gain [E] and 1 stack of andoainmod:dream . You can no longer gain andoainmod:ammunition .
AndoainMod:FallenHeaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn start: gain [E] and 1 stack of andoainmod:dream . You can no longer gain andoainmod:ammunition .

AndoainMod:IceCreamBlack.NAME: Chocolate Ice Cream
AndoainMod:IceCreamBlack.DESCRIPTION: Turn start: if [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine exists, apply 1 stack of andoainmod:apoptotic-damage to all enemies.
AndoainMod:IceCreamBlack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn start: if [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine exists, apply 1 stack of andoainmod:apoptotic-damage to all enemies.

AndoainMod:IceCreamWhite.NAME: Vanilla Ice Cream
AndoainMod:IceCreamWhite.DESCRIPTION: Next !M! turns start: if [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine exists, make it lose 6 HP (keep at least 1) and heal you 4 HP.
AndoainMod:IceCreamWhite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next !M! turns start: if [#66CCFF]Allied[] andoainmod:ice-cream-machine exists, make it lose 6 HP (keep at least 1) and heal you 4 HP.

AndoainMod:IceCreamPurple.NAME: Taro Ice Cream
AndoainMod:IceCreamPurple.DESCRIPTION: Turn start: gain effects based on andoainmod:ice-cream-machine faction. [#66CCFF]Allied[] : gain [E] . [#FF0000]Enemy[] : gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers and 2 stacks of andoainmod:dream .

AndoainMod:WhatISee.NAME: What I See
AndoainMod:WhatISee.DESCRIPTION: Scry 3. For each stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , additionally scry !M! . If top card is Attack card, play it and Exhaust .

AndoainMod:DarknessBeneathTheLight.NAME: Darkness Beneath the Light
AndoainMod:DarknessBeneathTheLight.DESCRIPTION: All Skill cards and Attack cards in hand cost 0 this turn. These cards are considered Status cards for this combat. You can play at most X-1 more cards this turn.
AndoainMod:DarknessBeneathTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Skill cards and Attack cards in hand cost 0 this turn. These cards are considered Status cards for this combat. You can play at most *X more cards this turn.

AndoainMod:NurserySanctum.NAME: Nursery Sanctum
AndoainMod:NurserySanctum.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Artifact .Turn start: gain 3 stacks of andoainmod:dream ,apply random positive or negative effects from andoainmod:effect-pool to all units.
AndoainMod:NurserySanctum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Artifact .Turn start: gain 3 stacks of andoainmod:dream ,apply random positive or negative effects from andoainmod:effect-pool + to all units. NL Upgrade Effect Pool base probability.

AndoainMod:RainNight.NAME: Rainy Night
AndoainMod:RainNight.DESCRIPTION: Double the following values or stacks: [E] , andoainmod:ammunition , Block, andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , Weak, Vulnerable, Frail, andoainmod:dream . Add 2 Regret to hand.

AndoainMod:Pathfinders.NAME: Pathfinders
AndoainMod:Pathfinders.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Choose one of three Pathfinder cards to add to hand.
AndoainMod:Pathfinders.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three upgraded Pathfinder cards to add to hand.

AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertChef.NAME: Pathfinder Dessert Chef
AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertChef.DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal !D! damage. When this card is retained, shuffle 1 *Pathfinder Dessert Truck into hand.
AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertChef.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal !D! damage. When this card is retained, shuffle 1 *Pathfinder Dessert Truck + into hand.

AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertCart.NAME: Pathfinder Candy Cart
AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertCart.DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal 1 stack of andoainmod:burn-damage to all enemies.
AndoainMod:PathfindersDessertCart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust . Deal 1 stack of andoainmod:burn-damage and 5 damage to all enemies.

AndoainMod:PathfindersSorcerer.NAME: Pathfinder Sorcerer
AndoainMod:PathfindersSorcerer.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Deal !D! damage and !M! stacks of Burn Damage to all enemies.
AndoainMod:PathfindersSorcerer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Deal !D! damage and !M! stacks of Burn Damage to all enemies.

AndoainMod:Requiem.NAME: Requiem
AndoainMod:Requiem.DESCRIPTION: Before turn ends, if you have curses or status cards in hand, Exhaust them. Gain !M! Block and 1 stack of andoainmod:dream for each card. This card does not leave andoainmod:dream at turn end when entering andoainmod:dream.
AndoainMod:Requiem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Before turn ends, if you have curses or status cards in hand, Exhaust them. Gain !M! Block and 1 stack of andoainmod:dream for each card. This card does not leave andoainmod:dream at turn end when entering andoainmod:dream.

AndoainMod:Firn.NAME: I Wish to Move Forward
AndoainMod:Firn.DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers current decay speed changed to decrease by 1 stack every 2 turns .
AndoainMod:Firn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers current decay speed changed to decrease by 1 stack every 2 turns .

AndoainMod:LightAndShadow.NAME: Light and Shadow
AndoainMod:LightAndShadow.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Ethereal . Gain 1 stack of Intangible and 3 stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Shuffle *Question into hand and *Answer into draw pile. NL At end of each turn, if you don't have andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers, lose 3 max HP.
AndoainMod:LightAndShadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . Gain 1 stack of Intangible and 3 stacks of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers . Shuffle *Question into hand and *Answer into draw pile. NL At end of each turn, if you don't have andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers, lose 3 max HP.

AndoainMod:Question.NAME: Question
AndoainMod:Question.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in hand. These cards are treated as *Doubt in the Exhaust pile.
AndoainMod:Question.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in hand. These cards are treated as *Doubt in the Exhaust pile.

AndoainMod:Answer.NAME: Answer
AndoainMod:Answer.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all andoainmod:ammunition . Each bullet deals damage equal to 4 times the total number of Status cards and Curses in Exhaust pile.
AndoainMod:Answer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all andoainmod:ammunition . Each bullet deals damage equal to 4 times the total number of Status cards and Curses in Exhaust pile.

AndoainMod:Angel.NAME: Angel
AndoainMod:Angel.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, gain #2 andoainmod:dream. NL You can now play Attack cards while in #yDeepDream. When entering and leaving #yDeepDream, gain !M! andoainmod:strength.
AndoainMod:Angel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, gain #2 andoainmod:dream. NL You can now play Attack cards while in #yDeepDream. When entering and leaving #yDeepDream, gain !M! andoainmod:strength.

AndoainMod:DreamWake.NAME: Dream Awakening
AndoainMod:DreamWake.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in andoainmod:dream. Deal !D! damage. Deal additional damage equal to total andoainmod:dream stacks gained this combat.
AndoainMod:DreamWake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in andoainmod:dream. Deal !D! damage. Deal additional damage equal to total andoainmod:dream stacks gained this combat.

AndoainMod:TheBorn.NAME: Birth
AndoainMod:TheBorn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. While in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state, deal additional damage equal to twice the damage taken while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers this combat.
AndoainMod:TheBorn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. While in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state, deal additional damage equal to twice the damage taken while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers this combat.

AndoainMod:NiceCake.NAME: Thousand-Stack Cake
AndoainMod:NiceCake.DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers healing amount and damage immunity chance both increased to 70%. NL At turn start, lose 2 Dexterity .
AndoainMod:NiceCake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers healing amount and damage immunity chance both increased to 70%. NL At turn start, lose 2 Dexterity .

AndoainMod:TheWorld.NAME: All Living Beings
AndoainMod:TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal . NL When you gain andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , andoainmod:ammunition , or andoainmod:dream , draw 1 card.
AndoainMod:TheWorld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you gain andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers , andoainmod:ammunition , or andoainmod:dream , draw 1 card.

AndoainMod:TheEnd.NAME: All to Dust
AndoainMod:TheEnd.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Execute the first X items: NL Clear all negative debuffs; increase andoainmod:ammunition limit by 2 and refill ammunition; deal !D! damage X-2 times.
AndoainMod:TheEnd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Execute the first X items: NL Clear all negative debuffs; increase andoainmod:ammunition limit by 2 and refill ammunition; deal !D! damage X-2 times.

AndoainMod:adlm1.NAME: First Meeting
AndoainMod:adlm1.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Understanding to draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.
AndoainMod:adlm1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Understanding to draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.

AndoainMod:adlm2.NAME: Understanding
AndoainMod:adlm2.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Reunion to top of draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers and apply 3 Vulnerable to all enemies. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.
AndoainMod:adlm2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Reunion to top of draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Gain 1 stack of andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers and apply 3 Vulnerable to all enemies. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.

AndoainMod:adlm3.NAME: Reunion
AndoainMod:adlm3.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Farewell to top of draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Shuffle 1 cost-0 *Pathfinders and 1 cost-0 *Find Path into hand. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.
AndoainMod:adlm3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Add 1 card *Farewell to top of draw pile. NL If andoainmod:gaze : Shuffle 1 cost-0 *Pathfinders and 1 cost-0 *Find Path into hand. Otherwise, shuffle *Lemuen's Gaze into hand.

AndoainMod:adlm4.NAME: Farewell
AndoainMod:adlm4.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Exhaust all *Lemuen's Gaze in hand, draw pile, and discard pile. Deal 70 damage for each card.
AndoainMod:adlm4.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Exhaust all *Lemuen's Gaze in hand, draw pile, and discard pile. Deal 80 damage for each card.

AndoainMod:GuidingAhead.NAME: Guiding Ahead
AndoainMod:GuidingAhead.DESCRIPTION: At turn start, gain 1 card *Pathfinders . When you play a andoainmod:pathfinder card while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state, gain [E] .
AndoainMod:GuidingAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At turn start, gain 1 card *Pathfinders+ . When you play a andoainmod:pathfinder card while in andoainmod:light-unto-sufferers state, gain [E] .

AndoainMod:Confess.NAME: Confession
AndoainMod:Confess.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. When andoainmod:execute enemy, gain a small chance to receive a random Andoain-exclusive relic at combat end.
AndoainMod:Confess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust . NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. When andoainmod:execute enemy, gain a *certain chance to receive a random Andoain-exclusive relic at combat end.
